name: Nine to Fright
description:
A game about a monster's typical office shift. Filing papers, answering emails and taking calls, all in a day's work. Make sure you keep on top of your hunger and energy though, you need them to help you power through the hours!

Credits:

Created by Team Metal Snail: Brandon Jackson (2D artist and coding) and Jake Cheung (3D backgrounds)

Resources used:

  • (Image) Poster
  • (Font) "We are survivors"
  • (Font) "DS-Digital"
  • (SFX) Email
  • (SFX) Printer
  • (SFX) Filing Cabinet
  • (SFX) Bathroom
  • (SFX) Phone
  • (SFX) Boss
  • (SFX) Chatter1 and Chatter2
  • (SFX) Recovering
  • (SFX) Correct and FailTask
  • (SFX) Countdown, Go, TaskComplete
  • (SFX) Wrong
  • (SFX) TimeUp
  • (Music) GameBGM
  • (Music) TitleBGM
